channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: It's a new year
item.description: TL;DR - I’m in Brexile - forced to remain in Germany with family because the alternatives are far too complicated. New Year 2021. Yay! 2020 was a massive dog’s breakfast of a year. 2021 starts with the completely unnecessary bullshit that is Brexit. The Macmillan dictionary helpfully defines a new word to classify my existence; one of Brexile. This definition does not really explain very much about the choices that have had to be made - I have been forcibly brexiled by the English government.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
